message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can always adjust later.
My turn!  How about a more agreeable 70/30 split? The clock is ticking, and I'm feeling generous.
Okay, I'm willing to come down a bit.  Let's go 80/20.  I'm still thinking long-term here, and a fair split will benefit us both in the end.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  60/40 is more than fair.  Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
I'm sticking to my guns.  70/30 is still reasonable, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.  Let's not waste any more time.
Alice, time is literally money in this game! I'm offering 55/45 - it's a compromise, and it's the best you'll get at this point.
I'm willing to go down to 65/35, but this is my final offer.  We're both losing value with every round, so let's be realistic.
